Title: Chicken with Plums
Writer: Marjane Satrapi, Vincent Paronnaud, Marjane Satrapi (comic book)
Actors: Mathieu Amalric, Edouard Baer, Maria de Medeiros, Golshifteh Farahani
Plot: Since his beloved violin was broken, Nasser Ali Khan, one of the most renowned musicians of his day, has lost all taste for life. Finding no instrument worthy of replacing it, he decides to confine himself to bed to await death.
